modName: Armored Skeletons and The Walking Dead
descriptionHtml:
[size=-1][b]Version:[/b] v3.1
[b]Date:[/b] 03/10/2013
[b]Author:[/b] lifestorock
[b]Requirement:[/b] needs at least v. 1.8.151.0 of the game[/size]
[color=Firebrick][b]Do not install this mod if you use:[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913]\"Skyrim Immersive Creatures\"[/url][/b]

[b]Translations:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29548]German[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27801]Italian[/url]
[line]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]
This mod adds several new Skeleton & Undead types into the world of Skyrim. The Skeletons wear now iron, steal or leather armor and make use of weapons according to this armor types. In addition to that they are stronger than the vanilla ones. Also a new iron armored draugr type is added and some Lich variants. The Lich is a fairly strong creature. He summons other Undeads for help and only appears at higher levels.
 
I originally created these models for my creature mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913]\"Skyrim Immersive Creatures\"[/url]. If you want even more new creatures I highly recommend to check out this mod.


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

[color=Firebrick][b]In any case, after installing or updating this mod don\'t forget to reset your cells (go into a building and sleep / wait for at least 31 days).[/color][/b]

No special actions needed if upgrading from a previous version!

The mod archive contains an ESP- and BSA a file. Use a mod-manager of your choice to install these files or simply paste them in Skyrim\'s \"Data\" folder.
If installing this mod into an existing savegame, don\'t forget to wait or sleep for 31 days. This is needed to make everything available immediately. 


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Mod Compatibility:[/b][/color][/size]
For compatibility with other mods I recommend to use Wrye Bash and create a Bashed Patch. Beside this there shouldn\'t be any issues with other mods. My mod contains only several level list edits, 1 NPC & 1 Cell edit.
[line]

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3322711]Grohiik[/url] for so many stuff
[*]PROMETHEUS_ts for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28957]Beast Skeletons[/url] mod
[*]nivea for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter Is Coming[/url] - thank you for letting me use your meshes & textures
[*]defunkt for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21431]Helmet variants[/url]
[*]LordSane for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24352]Clanking Armor[/url]
[*]Martigan for his savegame debloating scripts
[/list]

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Translators:[/b][/color][/size]
[list]
[*]Verodor for the German translation 
[*]Andre7890 for the Italian translation
[/list]

[b]Permission Note:[/b]
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod. My mod also contains assets released by other authors (take a look at the Credits). Permission for using this files must be obtained separately from the original author of the assets you want to use.

[center][size=+1][color=#ff0000][b]Under all circumstances any upload or re-upload to any other download site than the ones provided as authorized mirrors is explicitly forbidden![/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: lifestorock

files.name: Optional vanilla Steel Texture for Skeletons v3_1
files.fileName: Optional vanilla Steel Texture for Skeletons-26706-v3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
nerfed low level appearence of Undead
expended high level content
added feelable difference between the different armor types
Armored Skeletons utilized by other mods like ASIS, DFB or other spawn increaser are now able to resurrect
reworked resurrection system
new walking sounds for Armored Skeletons
fixed a bug that causes a slight incompatibility with mods altering skeletons
